name: Touch Grass Simulator
description:
At last! You have a way to feel the blades of grass through your fingers and experience what it's like to be outside!  Press the grass for awesome and money!  Press escape for more options!

Get all of the upgrades for the house to light up and click the house to level up.  I should have put this info in the game.

Warning - This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.
